snippet.title: Atomic Heart: Annihilation Instinct DLC#1 - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
❗ Atomic Heart from Mundfish studio is out now on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One and PC:
https://atomic.mundfish.com/en.html

Continue the story in the Annihilation Instinct DLC, the game’s 1st upcoming DLC, and learn what happened in its dystopian world after the Atomic Heart climax. 
Prepare to embark on a journey through the new mind-bending Mendeleev Complex and its surrounding swamps and discover the truth about NORA as Major P-3 is pulled back into Facility 3826. Survive vicious, shape-shifting new enemies and take them down using two new cunning weapons - ranged one the Secateur, and melee one the Klusha - as well as your glove’s new Techno-Stasis ability, allowing you to manipulate time itself.

Meet a new enigmatic character, as well as returning ones in surprising circumstances, and dive deep into the AI’s insanity to curb its Annihilation Instinct on August 2nd!

★★★★★

Atomic Heart is an action-adventure first-person shooter with RPG elements set in the mad utopia of an alternate 1955. In this utopian world of wonders and perfection, humans lived in harmony with their loyal and fervent robots. But with the launch of the latest robot-control system, a large-scale system failure occurred, which led to the unleashing of a technological nightmare at Facility 3826.
In the role of special agent P-3, you will have to fight robots out of control, and also learn the truth behind the rapid progress.

Follow Mundfish on social media:
- Official site: https://mundfish.com/
- Discord: https://discord.gg/AtomicHeart
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/mundfish
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/atomicheart_official
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AtomicHeartOfficial
- TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@atomicheartofficial
